content.en: Cancer algorithm advancements: Researchers are using algorithms to answer various questions related to cancer treatment. These algorithms are being used to accurately predict tumor mutation load, identify driver mutations, detect genomic alterations and biomarkers, estimate blood tumor mutational burden, and classify patients based on their likelihood of response to immunotherapy. The algorithms are also being used to optimize the calculation of tumor mutational burden and predict treatment response in cancer of unknown primary. These advancements in algorithmic analysis are helping to improve cancer diagnosis and treatment decisions.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for kræftalgoritmer: Forskere anvender algoritmer til at besvare forskellige spørgsmål relateret til kræftbehandling. Disse algoritmer bruges til nøjagtigt at forudsige tumor mutationsbyrde, identificere driver-mutationer, opdage genomiske ændringer og biomarkører, estimere mutationsbyrden i blodtumorer og klassificere patienter baseret på deres sandsynlighed for at respondere på immunterapi. Algoritmerne anvendes også til at optimere beregningen af tumor mutationsbyrde og forudsige behandlingsrespons ved kræft med ukendt oprindelse. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk analyse bidrager til at forbedre kræftdiagnostik og behandlingsbeslutninger.
